footer.companyDescription: To SignIT is a leading digital signature solution, providing secure and efficient document signing for businesses of all sizes.
footer.newsletterText: Stay updated with our latest features and releases.

briefCard.title3: Try To Sign It for free for

feature1.phrase: To Sign It offers a smooth and intuitive interface. No training needed: just send, sign, and manage your documents in a few clicks.

feature2.phrase: Every signature is encrypted, tracked, and legally valid. Compliant with eIDAS regulations, To Sign It guarantees confidentiality, integrity, and the security of your sensitive documents.

feature3.phrase: Plans designed for both individuals and businesses, with monthly or annual options, simple or advanced signatures, depending on your pace and usage volume.

mainContent.title4: The electronic signature and invoicing solution 100% compliant in France and Europe
mainContent.description: Welcome to To Sign It, your trusted partner for electronic signatures and electronic invoicing, designed to meet French and European legal requirements. Our platform supports you in the secure digitization of your documents while ensuring their legal validity.

advancedWorkflows.title: Advanced Workflows
advancedWorkflows.description: Choose pre-built connectors for your favorite everyday tools like Salesforce, Microsoft Word, Power Automate, Microsoft SharePoint and SAP.

whiteLabeled.title: White Labeled
whiteLabeled.description: Keep your branding when creating, signing or sending documents and own the entire signing experience.

packageSigning.title: Package Signing
packageSigning.description: Sign multiple documents or packages of documents with a single signature to save time and work efficiently.

highTrustSignatures.title: High-Trust Signatures
highTrustSignatures.description: Choose from a vast selection of digital signing and identification methods based on your needs. Each type having a different level of legality and its own unique user experience.

packages.title: Choose Your Perfect Plan
packages.description: Select the package that best suits your needs. We offer tailored solutions for both individuals and companies.

signDashboard.title: Send, Sign, Save time
signDashboard.description: Simple, fast, secure, legal. To Sign It — the intuitive, modern, reliable, professional, efficient, practical, and flexible electronic signature.

cardInfo2.head: Electronic invoicing
cardInfo2.phrase: Compatible with PDP, PPF, and OD

signaturePad.uploadPdfPlaceholder: Upload a PDF to start signing

cookieConsent.text: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience by personalizing content, improving functionality, and analyzing site performance. Cookies help us remember your preferences and provide you with relevant information, ensuring a seamless and efficient user journey. By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our privacy policy. You can adjust your cookie settings at any time through your browser. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of certain features, limiting your overall experience on our site.

signup.heading: And it's done!
signup.testimonial: From anywhere you can quickly make electronic signatures and safely sign your digital documents.

forgetPassword.instructions1: - We've emailed you instructions for setting your password, if an account exists with the email you entered. You should receive them shortly.
forgetPassword.instructions2: - If you don't receive an email, please make sure you've entered the address you registered with, and check your spam folder.
